page.title: 12Culture and Church;Sandwich
page.content: Sandwich has a culturally rich environ ment but only limited opportunities for the arts exist.An Adult Evening Centre at the Secondary School provides chances for learning some art and craft skills like pottery and needlework.A number of art exhibitions take place in St.Peter's Church.The History Society and more than thirty other groups operate in the town.Three museums,the Guildhall,Toy and Richborough Castle museums also help to preserve the town's cultural and artistic climate,while the White Mill (windmill)is also very popular. Of the six churches in Sandwich two are no longer used for worship(St.Mary's and St.Peter's).St.Clement's is the Parish Church,C of E,as is the St.Bart's chapel.The Rector says that just under 10% of local people attend church regularly.
